# contactIdentifier

**Instance Property**

The identifier for the contact associated with the person.

## Declaration

```swift
var contactIdentifier: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

When you use the contact’s [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Contacts/CNContact/identifier] value for the optional [doc://com.apple.corespotlight/documentation/CoreSpotlight/CSPerson/contactIdentifier] property, it enables a direct way to look up the associated contact.

## Accessing person properties

- **displayName**: A display name for the person.
- **handleIdentifier**: A key that identifies the type of contact property represented by the person object’s handle.
- **handles**: An array of contact handles related to the person.
